issues.title: Import blog posts from brianlscott.com
issues.description: Migrate existing blog posts: My Backup Strategy, Building an Automated Weekly Reflection System, Securing Your Home Lab

issues.title: Add dark mode support
issues.description: Implement CSS custom properties toggle for prefers-color-scheme media query. Zero JS approach.

issues.title: Add SEO meta tags
issues.description: Add Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags for social sharing

issues.title: Create 404 page
issues.description: Create src/pages/404.astro for better user experience on missing pages

issues.title: Add pagination to blog listing
issues.description: Implement pagination on /blog page for when posts grow beyond 10-15 items

issues.title: Add client-side search
issues.description: Implement Pagefind for zero-JS static search functionality

issues.title: Configure syntax highlighting theme
issues.description: Configure Shiki theme in astro.config.mjs for code blocks

issues.title: Add related posts component
issues.description: Show posts with matching tags at the end of blog articles

issues.title: Add image optimization
issues.description: Install and configure @astrojs/image for automatic image optimization

issues.title: Update About page with real content
issues.description: Update about page with Brian's real bio and social links from brianlscott.com

issues.title: Remove placeholder blog posts
issues.description: Delete the 3 placeholder posts (welcome, building-with-astro, retro-web-design) after importing real content

issues.title: Add custom pixel cursors
issues.description: Add custom pixel art cursors to match RPG theme. Default pointer and hand cursor for links.

issues.title: Add 8-bit sound effects
issues.description: Optional sound effects system with toggle. Menu hover blips, click sounds, page load chime. OFF by default, respects prefers-reduced-motion.

issues.title: Add Konami code easter egg
issues.description: Hidden easter egg triggered by Konami code (↑↑↓↓←→←→BA). Shows Game Boy color flash, CHEAT ACTIVATED text, unlocks persistent badge.

issues.title: Draft new blog posts
issues.description: Create draft outlines for: Claude Code workflow, Homelab setup 2026, Obsidian workflow. Set draft: true.

issues.title: Mobile optimization
issues.description: Ensure all pages are fully optimized for mobile: touch targets, font sizes, responsive layouts, no horizontal scroll.

issues.title: Deploy Cloudflare Pages with GitHub Actions
issues.description: Set up automated deployment via GitHub Actions with Cloudflare API token. Custom domain brianlscott.com.
